name: blocky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
heavy and solid: We could hear her coming down the hall in her big, blocky shoes. His blocky shoulders seemed to fill the entire corridor.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
weighing more than normalheavyWow, this suitcase is really heavy.weightyThe shelves were full of large, oversized dictionaries and other weighty volumes.weigh a tonMy old laptop weighs a ton compared to this new table. super-heavyThey sell a midsize SUV, but their latest SUV is super-heavy.ultra-heavyShe bought an ultra-heavy motorcycle for long-distance rides.
See more results »
square or rectangular in shape: The sign was done in blocky red letters on a white background. The complex was made up of four blocky grey buildings surrounded by fences and barbed wire.
(of a design, etc.) made up of square or rectangular shapes: I like big, blocky patterns, especially for children's clothes. The tablecloth had a blocky print.
More examplesFewer examplesThe picture makes the device look large and blocky, but it's actually very slimline, and light to carry.Sperm whales have blocky heads and a small mouth.She rose to fame during an era of modern art that emphasized bright colours and blocky, abstract shapes. I don't really like the blocky graphics.
